channel.title: Runelight - could you be the one to help us along the adventure? 317pi
channel.description:
Hello, moparscape today i am showing you my server that me and my mate neroxx have been working on we have only been working on this for a week or so. What we are currently looking for is people who have good knowledge of programming 317 pi servers must be active quite a bit bring new ideas to the server.
[b]We plant to make this go somewhere we have a vps ready for when it out the development stage, buy advertisements. but if you think you are up for this adventure join the development team now!![/b]
If you are intrested in working along side me and neroxx please fill in the application form, we are accepting part-time programmers but if you would want to be a part-time developer you must either pick one of these and that will be your part of the team doing said job.
Part-Time Development: ps you can be a full time developer and still have one of these as your main area to work in/on Quest - what you will be doing is creating some nice adventures quest to keep the server from being boring would like a couple random made up quest and some known made up quest content developer - works on bring new content into the server so you always have something to do for example - adding new bosses, fun pk zones, custom minigame, lotto system client help - works on the client adding new content from interfaces - adding in new items , updating gameframe skills developer - workings on making the skills better and get them up to 95-100% perfect
If you would like to become a full time developer or part time developer please fill this out [code]Name: Age: What country your from?: experience with programming (rate your self out of 10): proof of work?: if accepted would you be able to start right away?; skype?:[/code]
Server infomation 508 game frame 508 maps 602 npc and models gfx and animations torva added skill point leveling system added new bank interface added change a load of items that was in the wrong item slots added a shop to go with the point levling system added special attacks and animations and gfx to a bunch of items completed the shop for the point system and added in a bounch of items just fixing some bugs and getting out the way :P added a experience system new rs hit plates client menu button added allows you to turn different things on and off for example fog auto cache downloader added curse prayers 10x hp and prayer orbs
cant really think what else there is off the top of my head but here are some pictures much more coming soon
Pictures [img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/n32hpt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/10glidy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1zf7fbl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2hhktpv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/e9g39c.jpg[/img]

Liamp is back!

yeah i am
[/quote]

Where is my name in your sig? :p[/quote]
Haven’t change it since like 2 years when didn’t come on haha been checking up on your project its looking good to me

Read full topic

item.title: Runelight - could you be the one to help us along the adventure? 317pi
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

Hello, moparscape today i am showing you my server that me and my mate neroxx have been working on we have only been working on this for a week or so. What
we are currently looking for is people who have good knowledge of programming 317 pi servers must be active quite a bit bring new ideas to the server.

We plant to make this go somewhere we have a vps ready for when it out the development stage, buy advertisements. but if you think you are up for this adventure join the development team now!!

If you are intrested in working along side me and neroxx please fill in the application form, we are accepting part-time programmers
but if you would want to be a part-time developer you must either pick one of these and that will be your part of the team doing said job.

Part-Time Development: ps you can be a full time developer and still have one of these as your main area to work in/on
Quest - what you will be doing is creating some nice adventures quest to keep the server from being boring would like a couple random made up quest and some known made up quest
content developer - works on bring new content into the server so you always have something to do for example - adding new bosses, fun pk zones, custom minigame, lotto system
client help - works on the client adding new content from interfaces - adding in new items , updating gameframe
skills developer - workings on making the skills better and get them up to 95-100% perfect

If you would like to become a full time developer or part time developer please fill this out

Name: Age: What country your from?: experience with programming (rate your self out of 10): proof of work?: if accepted would you be able to start right away?; skype?:

Server infomation
508 game frame
508 maps
602 npc and models gfx and animations
torva added
skill point leveling system added
new bank interface added
change a load of items that was in the wrong item slots
added a shop to go with the point levling system
added special attacks and animations and gfx to a bunch of items
completed the shop for the point system and added in a bounch of items
just fixing some bugs and getting out the way
added a experience system
new rs hit plates
client menu button added allows you to turn different things on and off for example fog
auto cache downloader added
curse prayers
10x hp and prayer orbs

cant really think what else there is off the top of my head but here are some pictures much more coming soon

Pictures
